::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus was concerned by his daughters request, but she was getting older.

Roddy(comm): Once I hear the full details of this mission in the briefing I'll decide if you can come along or not. Alright?

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Elita/Nightlight.
 
 Nighlight jsut arrived where her daughter was and Elita said trought 
 her mini com link "I'm here dad, I want to go mission with ya, may 
 I??? PLEEEEEASSSEE, I want to go to a mission with you..."
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
 >
 > Lord Perseus entered the room, he nodded to Salveo who was at his 
 station
 > and then greeted Rodimus who was waiting for the briefing to start.
 > 
 > "Alright, where's everyone else?" he asked, somewhat annoyed.
 > 
 > Just then Ravenchief entered the room, he had been delayed by 
 talking to
 > Elita.  A minute later Guardia entered.
 > 
 > "I'm ready.  What do we have to do this time?" said Guardia, in a 
 somewhat
 > tired voice.
 > 
 > "I understand.  It doesn't seem like we've had any time to rest.  
 It's just
 > been one crazy senario after another." replied Salveo.
 > 
 > "Well, unfortunately I can't promise you that we'll have time to 
 rest.  But
 > I'll try to the best of my ability to get us some time to rest up." 
 said
 > Lord Perseus.  "I will start the briefing when everyone is here."
 >
